mapper.insert: insert into review(movie_id, member_id, content, rating, like_count, dislike_count, updated_at, created_at) values (#{movieId}, #{memberId}, #{content},#{rating}, #{likeCount}, #{disLikeCount}, current_timestamp , current_timestamp)
mapper.select: select r.id as reviewId, movie_id, login_id, r.member_id as member_id, nickname, content, rating, like_count, unlike_count from review as r left join member as m on r.member_id = m.id order by reviewId Desc limit #{startIdx}, 10
select rating, count(rating) from review where movie_id = #{movieId} group by rating order by rating asc
